name: Unforgettable memory with Saigon-born professionals before, during, and after Tet holidays
description:
Hello, my friends! Are you interested
in Vietnamese culture, history and cuisine? Then, I would recommend you to
discover Tet festival (Lunar New Year holidays) with me and experience how
people in Saigon celebrate Tet. Tet holidays are coming and I'll help your journey to Vietnam really unforgettable. I would be happy to take
you around Saigon and share with you our family's Tet experiences here. Saigon is my
hometown and I have been living here for decades. During Tet
holidays, Saigon suddenly has a totally different face with very special, warm,
peaceful and sacred atmosphere. You can feel that very nice change in every
corner of streets and every people you come across. I am sure that your experience
with me and our family will be very nice, unique and unforgettable for you.
